activities: Logic Supply, Inc. receives, stores, and/or processes personal information from the EU regarding customers, suppliers and vendors for business purposes involving finance and administration, sales and marketing activities, enterprise-wide IT services administration, and supply chain management. The personal information that Logic Supply, Inc. receives consists of IT services user data, business contact information, and customer, supplier, and vendor records for purchase, delivery and sales of products and services, product registration, marketing research, order management, customer service and support, business development and relationship management activities, website analytics, and compliance with legal requirements.
personaldata: customer and vendor off-line, on-line, manually processed data
recoursemech: Cooperation with EU data protection authorities pursuant to the Safe Harbor certification.
